description: A dataset for predicting insurance charges based on personal and demographic factors, relevant in actuarial and financial industries.

variables.meaning: The column 'age' contains data of type numerical. It represents the age of the observation.
The column 'sex' contains data of type categorical. It represents the sex of the observation.
The column 'bmi' contains data of type numerical. It represents the bmi of the observation.
The column 'children' contains data of type numerical. It represents the children of the observation.
The column 'smoker' contains data of type categorical. It represents the smoker of the observation.
The column 'region' contains data of type categorical. It represents the region of the observation.
The column 'charges' contains data of type numerical. It represents the charges of the observation.
